# Eigenvalues of a Normal Matrix

```{r}
set.seed(23)
M <- 4
# Generate matrix
P <- RM_normal(M, normal_args = c(0,1), symm = T)
# Run a batch
batch <- make_batch(M, B = 1000)
# Evolve a batch
#evolved_batch <- evolve_batch(P, batch, steps = 30)
evolved_batch <- read_csv(file = "../data/stdnormal_4_1000.csv")
# Get eigenvalues
eigenvalues <- eigen(P)$values
eigenvalues
```


```{r}
# Classify candidate eigenvectors
#evolved_batch0 <- eigen_classify(evolved_batch, P, epsilon = 0.1)
evolved_batch0 <- read_csv(file = "../data/evolved_batch0.csv")
# Add mixing times to the batch
batch0 <- eigen_mixtime(evolved_batch0,batch)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = batch0) + geom_histogram(mapping = aes(x = mixtime), fill = "deepskyblue3", labs = "Mixing Time Distribution for a Symmetric Standard Normal Matrix")
```
